name: Color Chaos (HD)
description:
- The Stroop Effect -
* You are given a word/color and four answer options.
* The objective is to correctly match the text color to the name of the color on the button as quickly as possible. (For example: if the word says “YELLOW”, but is green in color, the correct answer would be the button that says “GREEN”.)
* Be careful, answer incorrectly or let the timer run out 3 times and your game is over. No pressure.

The game has 4 different difficulty levels: easy, normal, hard, and ultimate. Can you conquer them all?
Saved high scores and reaction times to see how you’ve improved. A word to the wise, do not believe everything you see with your eyes!


FEATURES:
* Easy, normal, hard & ultimate difficulties
* Reaction times and high scores to challenge your friends
* Training for your brain
